description:
Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Abkhaz, Acehnese, Acholi, Afar, Afrikaans, Albanian, Alur, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Avar, Awadhi, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Balinese, Baluchi, Bambara, Baoulé, Bashkir, Basque, Batak Karo, Хамгийн баялаг үгсийн сантай Болор толь аппликэйшнийг эрдэмд шамдан суралцаж буй хэн бүхэнд зориулан бүтээлээ. 
Онцлог:
- Дуу яриаг боловсруулагч Чимэгэ технологийн тусламжтайгаар дуу хоолойгоор хайлт хийх болон үгийн дуудлага сонсох боломжтой.
- Монгол туургатан түмэндээ зориулан үндэсний бичгээрээ аппикэйшнийг ашиглах боломжийг олгосон.
- Хэл шинжлэлийн олон жилийн туршлага дээр суурилсан хамгийн баялаг үгсийн сантай.
- Интернэттэй болон интернэтгүй аль ч үед ашиглах оффлайн толь бичигтэй.

Энэхүү платформ нь зээлийн мэдээллийн сангийн бүхий л төрлийн үйлчилгээг иргэн бүрд хүртээмжтэй, ил тод, хялбар болгох зорилготой. Та өөрийн зээлийн мэдээлэлд гарч буй бүх төрлийн өөрчлөлтийг цаг алдалгүй хянах боломжтой.
 
Бүтээгдэхүүн үйлчилгээнүүд :
- FICO Score
- Зээлийн мэдээллийн сангийн лавлагаа
- Өр, орлогын харьцааны тооцоо
- Автомашины үнэлгээ
- Малын А дансны лавлагаа
- Мониторинг

description: Даатгуулагч та энэ программыг ашиглан өөрийн Нийгмийн даатгалд даатгагдсан байдал, авсан зардал, тэтгэвэр, тэтгэмжийн талаар болон, Нийгмийн даатгалтай холбоотой хууль, тогтоомжийн талаар мэдээлэл авах боломжтой.

Also it allows you to download songs from your cloud storages. It supports Dropbox®.

It is easy to use and useful. You can enjoy listening to songs without wifi.

Main Features: 
√ Download songs from your cloud storages.
√ Play downloaded songs with a powerful player.
√ Play local iPod songs with a powerful player.
√ Provide 3 play modes: normal, single, shuffle.
√ Manage your playlists.

How to use:
1. On the tab 'Cloud' choose the cloud platform Dropbox.
2. Click the Sign In icon button at the right top corner of the cloud platform section.
3. Connect to Dropbox and use your account. (If you have no account, you should register one.)
4. Get songs from your cloud storage. (You should upload your preferred songs to your cloud storage by yourself.)
5. Choose a downloaded songs to play and enjoy it.

Discover the power of language with Translate AI – your trusted companion for breaking language barriers while traveling, working, or learning.
Powered by advanced artificial intelligence, Translate AI delivers fast, accurate, and natural translations for text, voice, and images.

Exceptional Features for Global Communication

Text Translation
Instantly translate written words into multiple languages with high accuracy.
Whether you're a traveler trying to understand signs, a student learning a new language, or a professional communicating internationally, Translate AI is your reliable translation tool.

Voice Translation
Enjoy real-time, natural conversations without interruptions.
Perfect for international meetings, travel, or casual chats with people around the world.

Image Translation
Simply point your camera at signs, menus, or documents to get instant and precise translations directly on your screen.

Keyboard Translation
Seamlessly integrate translation into your daily typing.
Type in one language and get an instant translation in another — ideal for messages, chats, and emails.

Why Choose Translate AI

Multimodal Translation
Text, voice, or image — Translate AI adapts to any translation need.
Unmatched Accuracy
Our state-of-the-art AI understands context to provide natural, meaningful translations — not just word-for-word results.

Elegant and Easy-to-Use Design
A clean, modern interface makes switching between languages and translation modes effortless.

Continuous Updates
We’re constantly improving, adding new features and expanding our language database to give you the most comprehensive translation experience possible.
Translate AI is more than just an app — it’s a bridge that connects you to the world.

Download now and experience smart translation today!

Supported Languages
Enjoy translations across a wide range of languages, including Afrikaans, Arabic, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, and many more.

Pleco is the ultimate Chinese learning companion: an integrated dictionary / document reader / flashcard system with fullscreen handwriting input and live OCR, from a company that's been making the world's best mobile Chinese learning apps since 2001.

Major features: ($ = paid add-on)

• Amazing dictionaries. We offer two free built-in dictionaries: the popular open-source CC-CEDICT, with over 110,000 frequently-updated entries, and our own PLC dictionary, with 125,000 entries, parts of speech, and over 25,000 example sentences (with Pinyin). More than two dozen other dictionaries are available as free and paid ($) add-ons, including licensed titles from well-known publishers like Oxford, Longman, FLTRP, Tuttle, SLPH, and Commercial Press.

• Powerful merged search: look up words by Chinese characters, Pinyin (spaces / tones optional), or English, with support for wildcards and full-text search. And no need to tediously flip between all of those dictionaries to find a word - just type in your search term and instantly get a combined, frequency-sorted result list.

• Links and cross-references: easily look up character components, break down words into individual characters, look up lists of words containing a particular character, and search across all dictionaries for example sentences containing a word.

• Gorgeous typography: see it for yourself in our screenshots - we think we're one of the best-looking Chinese dictionaries around. Alternate Kai/Song/Xing-style Chinese fonts are also available ($).

• PRC/HK/Taiwan-friendly: every part of Pleco supports both traditional and simplified, headword readings can be shown in Pinyin and Zhuyin, and some dictionaries even support Cantonese. (note: stroke order diagrams do support traditional characters, but use PRC order)

• Audio: Hear Mandarin and Cantonese for words and example sentences using iOS' free built-in text-to-speech system. We also offer add-ons ($) with native-speaker Mandarin recordings and higher-quality Mandarin TTS.

• Document Reader: bring in text from the clipboard and tap on words in it to instantly look them up. Upgrade ($) adds support for tap-lookups in text, HTML, DOC, DOCX, PDF, and EPUB files. We also offer graded readings ($).

• OCR: look up words simply by pointing your device's camera at them, or by tapping on them in a still image. ($)

• Fullscreen handwriting: use your device's whole screen instead of just a little box. Extremely accurate and highly tolerant of stroke order mistakes. (enhanced $)

• Flashcards: create a card from any dictionary entry with a single button tap, import premade word lists, use advanced memorization techniques like SRS, and study in a variety of modes including fill-in-the-blanks handwriting and tone drills. ($)

• Stroke Order Diagrams: animations showing you how to draw each character; 500 characters for free, 28,000 in paid ($) version.

• User dictionaries: create new dictionary entries right on your device as you encounter new words. ($)

• No ads.

We also offer famously excellent customer support and an active user community at http://www.plecoforums.com. And we're constantly working to make our products better; our sales and customer base have been growing for two decades across 4 different platforms. You can be confident that we'll still be fixing bugs and adding features for years to come.

Paid add-ons can be transferred to other devices that link to your iTunes account just like any other paid iTunes content; simply install our free app, open up the "Add-ons" screen, and tap on the "Restore Purchases" button to activate your purchase on each device.

Please contact us at support@pleco.com, via the form at http://www.pleco.com/contact.html, or using the in-app "Contact Support" command with any questions - we'll be delighted to hear from you.

Want to try your luck, randomly select someone from a group of people, sort teams and pairs, etc?
"Finger Chooser - Random Picker" is what you need.

- Chooser
Touch the screen with your friends and the app will randomly pick one of you.
You can set the number of people who wins. (From 1 to 4)
Accompanied by sounds and vibrations.

- Decision Roulette
Choose one of 10 roulettes and spin the wheel.
Roulette will help you make a choice (what to eat, what to play, what kind of pet to get, what to do, what country to visit, etc.)
Сolor the roulette sectors choosing from a variety of color themes.

- Lucky Arrow
Arrange people or objects around the phone and click on the arrow on the phone screen. 
After spinning, the arrow will select someone or something.
Customize it. Great variety of themes.

- Coin
Wanna flip a coin for a hard decision? Select your favorite coin, choose stylish background and tap the screen to try your luck. Coin rotates, wobbles like a real coin. Complete with sound effects and cool graphics!

- Tutorial
Clear video instructions for each randomizer (Chooser, Arrow, Coin)

Subscription pricing and terms:

Subscription pricing and terms:

"Finger Chooser - Random Picker" app offers one auto-renewing subscription option:
$4.99 per month

This price is for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can go to your iTunes Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed.

Мандал даатгал ХК нь 2011 оноос хойш тасралтгүй үйл ажиллагаагаа явуулж байгаа отгон даатгалын компаниудын нэг бөгөөд эдүгээ салбартаа эхний 3т жагсах томоохон компани болж чадсан. Хэрэглэгч, харилцагчиддаа илүү ойртох үүднээс тэдэнд зориулсан мобайл АПП-г хөгжүүлж хэрэглээнд нэвтрүүллээ. Энэхүү АПП нь дараах онцлог, давуу талуудтай. Үүнд:
- Өөрийн даатгалын гэрээний мэдээллийг авах боломжтой

- Даатгалын хураамжийн хуваан төлөлтийн мэдээлэл авах, төлбөр төлөлтийн графикийн сануулга авах боломжтой
- Нөхөн төлбөрийн түүхээ харах боломжтой
- Идэвхитэй нөхөн төлбөрийн явцыг харах боломжтой
- Өөрийн болон даатгуулсан хөрөнгийн мэдээллийг шинэчлэх, харах боломжтой

- Санал хүсэлт, гомдол илгээх боломжтой

PlantAI is the most up-to-date AI plant care assistant using cutting-edge technology. The app helps you to get answers to your plant-related queries directly, but the usage isn't limited to that. You can identify any unknown plant species, diagnose your plant, and get professional plant care guides.

With PlantAI, you will be able to satisfy your plant curiosity anywhere anytime within seconds. You will get detailed plant information like its name, characteristics, and toxicity. Moreover, this app offers you hands-on planting and growing tips like water, fertilize, mist, clean, and repot.

Try the most trending AI plant chatbot to explore a bigger world of plants today!

Key features:
Get instant replies to any plant questions
Plant identification with high accuracy
Auto-diagnose plant health problems and get corresponding solutions
Expert-level plant care tips to help your greenery grow better
Give likes to the conversation

Get America's most useful and respected dictionary, optimized for your iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch. Continuously updated with the newest words and meanings, this is the premier iOS app for English language reference, education, and vocabulary building. 

Key Features:

* Offline access: Complete access to definitions and synonyms whether or not you're connected
* Voice Search: look up a word without having to spell it
* Word of the Day: learn a new word every day

* Favorite Words and Search History: keep track of the words that are most important to you
* Favorite Word Syncing Through iCloud: share your favorites between devices and on the Web

Expert Word Guidance:

Chinese learner all encounter the same problem: How to write Chinese characters?
You probably think learning how to write in Chinese is impossible.And I get it. I’m a native English speaker, and I know how complex Chinese characters seem.

But you’re about to learn that it’s not impossible.
All you need to know is a black magic – Chinese Stroke Order.

What is Chinese Stroke Order?

Strokes are the classified set of line patterns that are arranged and combined to form Chinese characters.Once you’ve mastered the strokes and learned the logic behind the radicals, learning Chinese writing will become a lot easier.

Why Chinese Stroke Order is so hard to learn?

Learning Chinese Strokes Order can be a bit scary and seems impossible at the first glance.

They just seem like scary blocks of words if you don’t know the idea of how they were formed. Before you start learning Chinese writing, you need to know the Chinese writing system first.

Chinese learners are all struggle with writing Chinese characters. It is very different from writing English,  all you need to do is write every letter on the same line and space them well, you than have nice clean readable words. But Chinese characters are a lot more difficult and more complicated. Each character can be separated in to different little sections, and putting them together in a structure is not an easy task. Stroke order can help you structure the Chinese character in a more systematic way, it also help you to learn Chinese better.

What’s the best way to overcome this difficult and how to master it?
Don's waste money to buy many books and apps to learn how to write Chinese characters, none of them actually help me improve your skill, until you find this amazing app  – Chinese Strokes Order! You can write Chinese characters so much easier and faster!

Why this app extreme help?
Chinese Strokes Order is the easy way to learn Chinese writing and calligraphy. Learn not only to write and recognize Chinese characters, but also to understand their meaning.

How you can make use of it?
All you have to do is simply type in a Chinese character and let the app show you its animated stroke order instantly.

You can easily change the stroke speed in the app’s settings if you find it hard to keep up, as well. It helps a lot for calligraphy and visualize stroke order.

Understand Chinese calligraphy
Extremely simple, efficient, and easy to use, it is sure to help you understand Chinese calligraphy and its meaning.

In addition, Chinese Strokes Order supports both simplified and traditional Chinese! The simple way to learn Chinese words and characters!

Simple but powerful Japanese-English, English-Japanese dictionary app. 

The app's features include:

● Over 170.000 dictionary entries with readings and english meaning
● Over 6.500 kanji characters with stroke order
● Over 730.000 Japanese names, place names and institution names
● Over 147.000 example sentences with translation

● Instantaneous search results

● Character input by kanji and kana handwriting recognition. Recognition algorithm can handle wrong stroke order and small mistakes.
● When multiple similar characters are found, you don't need to redo drawing after each character - just long  press to see a preview
● Search by kanji radicals (for example 日 and 月 will find 明)
● Wildcard search - "*" can replace any number of characters and "?" can replace any single character. Works both with English and Japanese words.
● Search by kanji, kana and romaji - "じしょ", "じsho" and "jisho" will give the same search results

● Kanji lists by JLPT level and school grade (1 - 6)
● Multiple word lists divided by subject, grammatical function, JLPT level and more

모바일에 최적화된 다양하고 풍부한 정보! 매일 새로워지는 네이버앱을 만나보세요.

네이버앱은 콘텐츠 유형에 따라 5개의 공간을 제공합니다.
내가 좋아하는 건 주제별로 ‘홈피드’에서, 짧고 빠르게 즐기는 숏폼은 ‘클립’에서, 뉴스와 각종 읽을 거리는 ‘콘텐츠’에서, 나의 쇼핑 흐름에 맞춰 깎고, 받고, 쌓는 경험은 ‘네이버플러스 스토어’에서, 인증과 결제 뿐만 아니라 내 활동 내역을 확인할 수 있는 ‘마이’까지, 일상의 편리함 네이버앱, 지금 다운로드하세요!

1. 내 취향 콘텐츠를 주제별로 탐색해 보세요.
검색홈 하단에서 내가 좋아하는 주제를 골라 콘텐츠를 탐색할 수 있어요. 스포츠, 엔터, 패션뷰티와 테크까지! 다양한 주제의 맞춤 콘텐츠를 끊임 없이 추천해드려요.

2. 이미지와 영상으로 남기는 나만의 리뷰, 클립
짧은 여유 시간엔 클립을 감상하고 특별한 순간엔 직접 이미지와 영상으로 남겨보세요. 마음에 드는 크리에이터를 팔로우 할 수 있고 나만의 공간에서 내 클립들을 모아볼 수 있어요. 클립 하나로 보는 즐거움과 만드는 재미를 모두 경험해 보세요.

3. 더 깎아주고 더 쌓아주는 네이버플러스 스토어
홈 하단에서 내게 꼭 맞는 상품과 혜택이 가득한 쇼핑 콘텐츠를 통해 탐색과 발견의 즐거움을 더해줍니다.
오늘의 할인 혜택과 다양한 프로모션, 인기 트렌드까지 초개인화 맞춤 추천으로 깎고, 받고, 쌓는 셈이 다른 쇼핑을 경험해 보세요.

4. 인증, 결제, 활동내역까지 마이에서 한눈에
현장에서 지갑대신 사용할 수 있는 인증, 결제도구와 내 결제/예약 주문 목록 및 찜한 상품, 저장한 장소 등 흩어져있던 내 활동내역을 마이에서 모아볼 수 있어요.

5. 그린닷 AI검색으로 일상을 편리하게 
그린닷을 통해 이미지 기반으로 정보를 검색하는 렌즈, 궁금한 음악을 찾아주는 음악검색, 손을 쓰지 않아도 검색이 가능한 음성검색, 음식점을 비롯한 주변 정보를 알려주는 내 주변 등 다양한 검색 기능을 더욱 편리하게 이용할 수 있어요.

※ 참고 사항
네이버앱을 쾌적하게 이용하기 위해서는, iOS 16.0 이상의 환경에서 설치하는 것을 권장합니다. 앱이용 중 문제가 발생한 경우 네이버앱 설정-고객센터로 문의해 주세요.

웹사이트에서 음성 인식 기능 이용 시 '음성인식' 권한이 필요할 수 있습니다. '음성인식' 권한을 허용한 상태에서 음성인식 기능을 이용하는 경우 Apple의 정책에 따라 음성 데이터가 Apple로 전송되며, 그 외 다른 정보는 일체 전송 되지 않습니다.

Point your camera at any text—menus, signs, labels—and Translate AI will detect and translate it instantly. Use our AI image translation technology to see the world through your language.

Type or paste text to receive fast, accurate translations. From single words to full sentences, our ai translator engine ensures clarity every time.

Smarter Translations, Thanks to AI

Whether you’re learning a new language, traveling the globe, or connecting across cultures, Translate AI is the smartest way to speak fluently and confidently. With our built-in AI for translation, you can say what you mean and understand what others say—without delay.

Whenever you need translation during your travels, business trips or while studying a language just bring Papago, a smart parrot who can translate multiple languages for you.

▶ What does ‘Papago’ mean? 
In Esperanto, Papago refers to a parrot, a bird with language abilities. 
Papago supports 14 languages : Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified/Traditional), Spanish, French, Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian, Russian, German, Italian and Arabic. 

▶ Main features
1) Text Translation
Real-time text translation for phrases and words

2) Image Translation
Automatic recognition and translation of text in the image by taking a picture and pressing the button 

3) Voice Translation
Real-time voice translation to both text and audio

4) Offline translation
Can translate even in offline

5) Conversation Translation 
Simultaneously speak in each other’s language when talking one-on-one with a foreigner

6) Handwriting Translation
Handwriting translation that finds the correct word and translation when you write using your finger

7) Website Translation 
Automatic translation for all content when you include the URL of a foreign website

8) Edu
Taking a picture of the passage you want to study will create a 
My Note that you can use to study passages and words

9) Dictionary
Dictionary information provided to check additional meanings other than initial translation results

Be confident anytime, anywhere with your translating partner Papago!

developer: MOBIVERSITE YAZILIM BILISIM REKLAM VE DANISMANLIK HIZMETLERI SANAYI TICARET LIMITED STI
description:
Your face is a time machine with EDNA. Our advanced technology generates a stunning photo of your ancestors and reveals your true origin story. See who you really are. All from just one selfie.

Forget boring family trees that end in names on a chart. We offer a tangible connection. Our technology renders a lifelike, era-authentic portrait of ancestors you’ve never met, capturing a plausible likeness with a strangely familiar face. It’s a jaw-dropping, shareable moment of connection when you see your own eyes, your smile, looking back at you from another time. This is the family photograph that was never taken.

But the portrait is just the beginning. It’s your entry point into a complete Ancestral Report, a deep dive into the elements that define your heritage.

First, discover your true origins with a detailed, percentage-based breakdown of your nationality. Go beyond continents to see the specific blend of cultures that make up your unique identity, revealing connections you never knew existed. Then, we reveal their story. Learn about the specific city your ancestors likely called home, the authentic craft they dedicated their lives to, and even the historical diet that fueled their world.

Your origin story doesn't just end in the past—it echoes in your present. The resilience of a frontiersman, the precision of an artisan, the creativity of a storyteller; these are more than historical facts, they are potential traits within you. We connect your heritage to your life today, offering unique insights for modern careers and lifestyles that may align with these ancestral strengths. It’s a powerful new way to understand your own passions and potential.

Join a growing community of people discovering themselves in a completely new way. The stories and portraits generated by EDNA are sparking conversations, connecting families, and helping people see their own identity in a richer, deeper light. It's a unique experience everyone is talking about.

This isn’t a guess. Our analysis is powered by a vast database of real historical records, cultural trends, and geographic data. This robust framework allows us to create a narrative that feels both magical and deeply plausible. We are committed to your privacy; your photo and personal data are always secure and are never shared.

To analyze your photos and create your unique ancestral story, you’ll need a True Heritage Pro subscription. The Pro subscription allows you to unlock full access to detailed reports, including Explore Your Ancestors, Explore Your Origins, Your Ideal Partner, and Your Past Life. Please note that photo analysis and viewing the complete content of any generated reports are premium features available only to subscribers

Subscriptions:
To access all premium content we have subscription packages. Subscription periods are 1 week and 1 year. Every week or year your subscription renews.
1 week subscription price is $5.99 and 1 year price is $29.99.

Subscriptions will automatically renew unless cancelled at least one day before the renewal date within 24 hours before the end of the current period. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. You can manage and cancel your subscription by going to your account settings in the App Store

Download True True Heritage & Ancestry: EDNA now and finally meet your ancestors.
--
